snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is planning to travel to Capitol Hill on Monday to seek nearly $33 billion to pay for storm cleanup and billions more to prepare for future storms.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M. Cuomo is planning to travel to Capitol Hill to seek nearly $33 billion in federal disaster aid to pay for cleanup from Hurricane Sandy and billions more to prepare for future storms.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is planning to travel to Capitol Hill on Monday to seek nearly $33 billion to pay for storm cleanup and billions more to prepare for future storms.

headline.seo: Cuomo Headed to Washington Requesting Billions for Disaster Repair
headline.main: Cuomo Plans Trip to Washington to Press for Disaster Aid
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Plans Trip to Washington to Press for Disaster Aid
